ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: The authors thank Echo Chen (HKU) for sample collection and coordination, Jodi Chan (HKU) for technical assistance, Mahen Perera (HKU) and Florian Krammer (Mt Sinai) for preparing the cH9/1N3 virus, Christopher Mok (HKU) and Nicholas Wu (Scripps Institute) for preparing the H3‐HA B‐cell probe, Scarlett Limeng Yan (HKU) for preparing the H3N2 challenge virus, and Raghavan Varadarajan (Indian Institute of Science) for providing HA stem proteins.
